snippet.title: Life is Strange Episode 3 Launch Trailer (PEGI)
snippet.description:
Get the game here: http://www.lifeisstrange.com

In this next installment of Life is Strange, Max and Chloe’s investigation into Rachel Amber’s disappearance lead them to break into Blackwell Academy after dark, to search for answers. Secrets will be uncovered and Max will find another use for her power.

Life is Strange episode 3 -  'Chaos Theory' is out now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC 

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifeIsStrangeGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LifeIsStrange
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lifeisstrangegame
Tumblr: http://lifeisstrange-blog.tumblr.com
VK: https://vk.com/lifeisstrange
Discord: http://discord.gg/lifeisstrange
